name: Hawaiian Burgers
author: Butterball
summary: Grilled turkey burgers are served on toasted buns with slices of Cheddar cheese, red onion, and grilled pineapple.
ingredients: 4  Butterball® Original Seasoned Frozen Turkey Burgers
4  hamburger buns, horizontally cut in half, toasted
directions: For Sweet Chili Mayo, combine ingredients
Set aside until ready to use
Cook frozen burgers according to package directions, until internal temperature reaches 165 degrees F as measured with a meat thermometer
Place 1 slice of cheese over each burger
Remove burgers from grill; keep warm
Grill pineapple slices 1 to 2 minutes per side or until there are grill marks on each side
Spread Sweet Chili Mayo evenly over cut surfaces of each bun
Layer bottom half of bun with lettuce, cooked burger, onions and pineapple
Cover with top of bun and serve
